entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
